comments.author: joe@drew.ca
comments.creator: joe@drew.ca
comments.raw_text: We should collect the image cache hit rate using Telemetry. (It's not clear how collectable this information is right now, since aiui currently telemetry only supports simple counters and histograms, but we can make it work.)
comments.text: We should collect the image cache hit rate using Telemetry. (It's not clear how collectable this information is right now, since aiui currently telemetry only supports simple counters and histograms, but we can make it work.)
